mapper.select: select * from ( select '0' colorId, '短期预报' name, '0' count from dual union all select '1' colorId,'中期预报' name, '0' count from dual union all select '2' colorId,'长期预报' name, '0' count from dual union all select '3' colorId,'气象专题专报' name, '0' count from dual union all select '4' colorId,'重大气象专题专报' name, '0' count from dual )f where 1=1
select type id, case type when 0 then '短期预报' when 1 then '中期预报' when 2 then '长期预报' when 3 then '气象专题专报' else '重大气象专题专报' end colorLevelName,COUNT(type) count from message group by type

select m.area_id areaId,a.area_name city ,COUNT(type) count, case type when 0 then '短期预报' when 1 then '中期预报' when 2 then '长期预报' when 3 then '气象专题专报' else '重大气象专题专报' end colorLevelName from message m LEFT JOIN area a on m.area_id=a.id group by area_id,type
select count(1) from message w where 1=1

select organization_id orgId,m.organization_name name ,COUNT(type) count, case type when 0 then '短期预报' when 1 then '中期预报' when 2 then '长期预报' when 3 then '气象专题专报' else '重大气象专题专报' end type from message m group by organization_id,type
select id, name ,0 count from channel

select channelName,channelId ,count(channelId) count from( select c.message_id,c.channel_id channelId,ch.name channelName from message_content c left JOIN channel ch on ch.id =c.channel_id )s group by channelName,channelId

select DATE_FORMAT(send_time, '%Y-%m-%d') sendTime, case type when 0 then '短期预报' when 1 then '中期预报' when 2 then '长期预报' when 3 then '气象专题专报' else '重大气象专题专报' end type, COUNT(type) count from message GROUP BY sendTime,type order by sendTime desc
select city,COUNT(city) num from ( select u.id keyId, a.area_name city from warn_callback_child w INNER JOIN user u ON u.code=w.code inner join area a ON a.id=u.area_id) a GROUP BY city
select c.id,c.name,sum(total) num from message_callback_main m left join channel c on m.channel_code=c.code group BY c.id
